MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK8 postcode area of Stirling, affecting properties in Allan Park and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.02AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 10.33AM on 05 December 2020.
